dcterms:creator: Wen Liu
Weixin Luo
Dongze Lian
Shenghua Gao
dcterms:description: A medium-scale dataset from fixed-angle street video surveillance containing 437 videos, including 307 normal videos and 130 anomaly videos, used as a benchmark for anomaly detection.
dcterms:title: ShanghaiTech

dcterms:creator: Waqas Sultani
Chen Chen
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: A large-scale anomaly detection dataset containing 1900 untrimmed videos with a total duration of 128 hours from real-world street and indoor surveillance cameras, covering 13 classes of anomalies.
dcterms:title: UCF-Crime

dcterms:creator: Peng Wu
jing Liu
Yujia Shi
Yujia Sun
Fangtao Shao
Zhaoyang Wu
Zhiwei Yang
dcterms:description: A large-scale multi-scene anomaly detection dataset collected from real-life movies, online videos, sport streaming, surveillance cameras, and CCTVs, containing 4754 untrimmed videos.
dcterms:title: XD-Violence

dcterms:creator: Dan Xu
Rui Song
Xinyu Wu
Nannan Li
Wei Feng
Huihuan Qian
dcterms:description: A small-scale dataset combined from two sub-datasets, Ped1 and Ped2, used for weakly supervised anomaly detection, containing videos of pedestrian activities.
dcterms:title: UCSD-Peds
